headline: Prediction: This Stock Could Be a Winner of the AI Networking Boom (Hint: It's Not Nvidia or Broadcom)
summary: Picking a stake in this high-quality artificial intelligence (AI) networking stock can supercharge your portfolio.

headline: Arista Networks price target raised to $175 from $150 at Evercore ISI
summary: Evercore ISI raised the firm’s price target on Arista Networks (ANET) to $175 from $150 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares, noting that its price target is revised to reflect better the expected calendar year 2026 growth after the company said during its analyst day that it expects sales growth of about 20% to $10.5B. For the long-term, Arista expects to see mid-teens sales growth, gross-margins of 60%-64% and EBIT margins of 43%-45%, the analyst noted. Published first on TheFly – the

headline: Arista Networks (ANET): Assessing Valuation Following Recent Share Price Fluctuations
summary: Investors watching Arista Networks (ANET) might be scratching their heads after the stock’s recent ups and downs. With little in the way of headline-making news driving the latest move, the shifts have drawn attention mostly because they seem to run counter to the recent trend in the broader technology sector. These are the moments when it pays to pause and ask whether there is a signal amid the noise, or if the current lull is simply part of the bigger picture for Arista. Despite a pullback...
